## Required New Patterns

### 1. Quantum Agricultural Operations
```typescript
interface QuantumAgriculturalOperation<T extends AgriEntity> {
  // Missing Pattern: Quantum State Transitions
  transitionState(
    currentState: QuantumState<T>,
    targetState: QuantumState<T>,
    constraints: NaturalLaws
  ): Promise<QuantumTransition<T>>;

  // Missing Pattern: Reality Manipulation
  manipulateReality(
    currentReality: FarmReality,
    desiredOutcome: AgriculturalOutcome,
    naturalConstraints: BiodynamicRules
  ): Promise<ModifiedReality>;
}
```

### 2. Enhanced Testing Patterns
```typescript
class QuantumAgriculturalTest {
  // Missing Pattern: Reality State Testing
  async testRealityTransition(
    initialState: FarmState,
    operation: QuantumOperation,
    expectedOutcome: FarmState
  ): Promise<TestResult>;

  // Missing Pattern: Quantum Coherence Testing
  async validateQuantumCoherence(
    farm: QuantumFarm,
    timeframe: TemporalSpan
  ): Promise<CoherenceReport>;
}
```

### 3. Advanced Performance Patterns
```typescript
class QuantumPerformanceOptimizer {
  // Missing Pattern: Multi-Reality Caching
  private multiRealityCache: Map<RealityKey, QuantumState>;

  // Missing Pattern: Temporal Compression
  async compressTemporalOperations(
    operations: AgriculturalOperation[],
    timeConstraints: TemporalLimits
  ): Promise<OptimizedOperations>;
}
```
